content: You can vote for html signature at https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/allow-html-signatures-in-k-9-mail-thunderbird-for-android/idi-p/28983
creator: wsmwk

content:
Hi there,

Thunderbird for Android is not meant for this scenario, it lacks the necessary features for this. I'd recommend using either a desktop mail program (like Thunderbird) or webmail to filter and remove the no longer needed emails.

Regards, Bal√°zs
